guidelines: Foundation: Laravel 12, PHP 8.2, declare(strict_types=1) in PHP files.
Code style: Use Pint; run `vendor/bin/pint` before finalizing changes.
Architecture: Follow existing Laravel MVC + Inertia structure; reuse components; avoid duplication.
Frontend: React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind v3; RTL/Arabic support; use RTL utilities.
Validation & Routing: Use Form Requests for validation; Inertia::render for server routes.
Boost tooling: Use Boost commands when needed; consult docs via `search-docs`.
CI/CD: Integrate Pint in CI and ensure `pint` runs on push.
Security: Validate inputs via Form Requests; Eloquent relations; avoid raw queries.
Localization: Arabic (RTL) support; translations loaded via Laravel localization.
